reviewText: A half hour program hosted by Mel Allen, this tape is a compilation of the ten greatest moments in Yankees history as decided by readers of the New York Daily News.  The most recent is the no hitter pitched by Righetti in  1983.  The tape has actual footage from each moment and an intro by Mel  Allen.  Allen sets the stage for each with his distinctinve voice.  For  Yankees fans this tape gives you clips of DiMaggio, Mantle, Ruth, Gehrig,  Larsen, Reggie Jackson and Bucky Dent all in their moments in the sun.  This tape can be watched over and over again.
